original_title: Special increments and commendation certificates for non-striking employees
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers has approved President Ranil Wickremesinghe’s proposal to grant a special pay increment to non-executive government officials who reported for duty on July 8 and 9, 2024, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
Meanwhile, approval has also been granted to issue them a commendation certificate for future promotions, according to the PMD.
